summary: First ever female hurricane hunter crew comments on Hurricane Dorian
body: National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Lt. Lindsey Norman, one of three women aboard NOAAâ€™s first all-female Hurricane Hunter flight crew currently monitoring Hurricane Dorian, flying into the eye of the deadly storm. Dorian pummeled the Bahamas and is currently traveling off the coasts of Georgia and the Carolinas, bringing the risk of dangerous winds, flooding and storm surge.
